pullrequest.title: Added ERB parsing to the gz tool

content.raw: If I run the `UNIT_ForceTorqueSensor_TEST` repeatedly, for example with `--gtest_repeat=20`, it causes a ruby seg-fault. On trusty, it takes 5 repetitions; on OS X it takes 3. I've queued a [jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64/23/) of 1d498048cf34 with multiple repetitions of the test to confirm the failure.
content.html: If I run the UNIT_ForceTorqueSensor_TEST repeatedly, for example with --gtest_repeat=20, it causes a ruby seg-fault. On trusty, it takes 5 repetitions; on OS X it takes 3. I've queued a jenkins job of 1d498048cf34 with multiple repetitions of the test to confirm the failure.
